title: ‘DMK is committed to protect lives of Sri Lankan Tamils’
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawarhana International conference soon to highlight sufferings of Tamils, says Karunanidhi The DMK is committed to protect the lives and livelihood of the Sri Lankan Tamils and it would continue to fight for their rights in the post-Eelam struggle period too, party president M. Karunanidhi asserted in Tiruchi on Thursday….
